data.name: Settings_Accent_CriticalCondition
data.value: Change window color when a ship is in critical condition

data.name: Settings_Flash_Message
data.value: Affects DMM.com, OSAPI and API links. You must reload the game for the changes to take effect.

data.name: Settings_Flash_Quality_ToolTip
data.value: Best: Anti-Aliasing enabled on all images (Slowest) High: Default. Auto-High: Automatically lowers quality when needed. Medium: Average Performance AutoLow: Will emphasize speed when needed Low: Performance over quality. Ugliest setting.

data.name: Settings_Flash_Window_ToolTip
data.value: Opaque: Default (Old IE has no HW accel) Direct: Fastest rendering speed (HW accel) GPU: Slow! GPU optimization for tablets.

data.name: Settings_Notifications_AheadOfTime_Description
data.value: Recommended: 40-50 seconds. Specifies the server time deviation, up to 1 minute depending on various factors.

data.name: Settings_Notifications_FleetsMorale
data.value: Notify when a fleet recovers from fatigue

data.name: Settings_Notifications_FleetsMorale_Description
data.value: Notifies when the morale of every ship girl in a fleet reaches this threshold. Morale increases by 3 every 3 minutes, but due to the way the API works the notification might appear earlier than needed.

data.name: Settings_Notifications_FleetsMorale_Reference
data.value: ※ Can be set in Settings → Sortie, Sortie condition.

data.name: Settings_Notifications_NotificationPlugins_InUse
data.value: The following plugin is being used

data.name: Settings_Notify_CriticalCondition
data.value: Give a notification for ships in critical condition

data.name: Settings_Operation_LoS_New
data.value: (Recon planes × 2) + (RADAR) + √(Total LoS with Eq. LoS included - Recon planes - RADAR)

data.name: Settings_Operation_LoS_New_Desc
data.value: Used in cases where equipment LoS is more important.

data.name: Settings_Operation_LoS_SeaplaneBomber_Tooltip

data.name: Settings_Operation_LoS_SeaplaneRecon_Tooltip

data.value: Simple sum of ship and equipment LoS

data.value: The method used in KanColleViewer! prior to version 3.2.

data.name: Settings_Operation_LoS_Title
data.value: Use the following formula to calculate fleet LoS:

data.name: Settings_Operation_SortieCondition_Title
data.value: Minimum fleet condition to be considered ready for sorties.

data.value: Append untranslated items to the translation files

data.value: KCV was unable to check for updates.

data.value: New Version of KCV is available: v{0}! Click here to get it.

data.name: Updater_Notification_TransUpdate_Fail
data.value: KCV was unable to download the translations.

data.name: ZoomFactorSelector_Tooltip
data.value: Adjust the display size of the game screen.

data.name: ProxyBootstrapper_PortChangeNote
data.value: ※ Please press Retry to apply changes.

data.name: Settings_BrowserControl_ZoomInformation
data.value: You can change the display size of the game (IE) with the zoom button at the top of the window. Screenshots are not affected by this setting and will always be taken at 100% scale.

data.name: Settings_Network_ListenPortTitle
data.value: Specify custom local port to listen on

data.name: Settings_Network_ProxyCustomDesc
data.value: Specify a custom proxy server for all protocols. Specifying an IP address instead of a hostname is recommended to avoid server name resolution issues.

data.name: Settings_Network_ProxyDirectDesc
data.value: Do not use a proxy server for all protocols.

data.name: Settings_Network_ProxyIEDesc
data.value: Use the proxy server specified in Internet Options Control Panel applet. HTTP proxy settings are applied immediately. Settings for all other protocols are applied on application start-up or upon pressing the Apply button below.

data.name: Settings_Plugins_FailedToLoadDesc
data.value: Below you can examine the error log for each plugin that failed to load.

data.name: Settings_Plugins_LoadedDesc
data.value: These plugins were successfully loaded and can be configured:

data.name: Settings_Window_ConfirmExit
data.value: Request confirmation when closing the application

data.name: Settings_Network_Proxy_UseForAllProtos
data.value: Use this proxy server for all protocols (except SOCKS)

data.name: Notifications_Test_Details
data.value: This is a test notification from KanColleViewer.

data.name: ViewRangeLogic_Type1_Desc
data.value: Simple sum of ship and equipment LoS

data.name: ViewRangeLogic_Type2_Desc
data.value: (Recon planes × 2) + (Radar) + √(Total LoS with equip LoS included - Recon planes - Radar)

data.name: ViewRangeLogic_Type3_Desc
data.value: Dive Bomber LoS × (1.04) + Torpedo Bomber LoS × (1.37) + Carrier-based Recon LoS × (1.66) + Recon Seaplane LoS × (2.00) + Seaplane Bomber LoS × (1.78) + Searchlight LoS × (0.91) + Small Radar LoS × (1.00) + Large Radar LoS × (0.99) + √(base LoS of each ship) × (1.69) + (HQ Lv. rounded up to the next multiple of 5) × (-0.61)

data.name: Settings_Operation_CheckFlagshipIsNotRepairShip
data.value: Check that the flagship is not a repair ship

data.name: FleetWindow_AirSuperiority_Max_ToolTip
data.value: Maximum skill level for all aircraft.

data.name: FleetWindow_AirSuperiority_Min_ToolTip
data.value: Minimum skill level; AS is only calculated for carrier-based aircraft.

data.name: Settings_Operation_LoS_UseFleets
data.value: In a combined fleet setting, use these fleets to calculate LoS:

data.value: Includes stat bonuses from the equipment

data.value: Includes stat bonuses from the equipment
